amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to prohibit the expenditure of Federal funds for the purpose of conducting any survey of minors that is intended to elicit certain personal or sensitive information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of several amendments, offered en bloc, to prohibit the expenditure of federal funds for the purpose of conducting any survey of minors that is intended to elicit certain personal or sensitive information.

action.text: On agreeing to the Dornan amendments (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 291 (Roll No. 286).
